entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:25 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
